name: T-feature
description: Type: a new feature to implement

name: T-documentation
description: Type: write documentation

name: T-refactor
description: Type: refactoring of existing code

name: T-test
description: Type: add tests to the codebase

name: T-bug
description: Type: fix a bug

name: T-performance
description: Type: improve code performances

name: T-build
description: Type: modify the build system or external dependecies

name: C-isolated
description: Context: no previous knowledge of the codebase required

name: C-coupled
description: Context: interact with some parts of the codebase

name: C-intricated
description: Context: deep understanding of the codebase

name: D-easy
description: Difficulty: anybody can understand it

name: D-intermediate
description: Difficulty: mobilise some notions about the field, but can be learned while doing

name: D-hard
description: Difficulty: require extensive knowledge about the field

name: L-under-a-day
description: Length: wil take up to one day

name: L-few-days
description: Length: will take a few days

name: L-weeks
description: Length: will take multiple weeks

name: S-preliminary
description: State: on the drawing board

name: S-open
description: State: ready for contribution

name: S-in-progress
description: State: work in progress

name: S-review
description: State: waiting on review
